content.value:
Burnout is less related to how much you’ve been doing but instead how much progress you’ve been making.

When you start feeling burned out, try to figure out which lack of progress is affecting you. Is it your project? A coworker? Another team? Your leadership? Or your career?
content.html: Burnout is less related to how much you’ve been doing but instead how much progress you’ve been making. When you start feeling burned out, try to figure out which lack of progress is affecting you. Is it your project? A coworker? Another team? Your leadership? Or your career?
